discourse_list.title: Article: Crypto Venture Investors Choi, Wang Launch Fund for Web3

content.content: This looks interesting. They are alleging that there will be no management fees which is a huge perk if it is true. The article states “[a] public deck for the fund shows that it provides resources from audit, legal structure, to media and technical support” and I would love to see what that all looks like, especially the legal structure. I wonder if the fund with include and DAI and/or MKR. I wonder how decentralized it will end up being. I guess we will see… https://www.bloomberg.com/news/articles/2022-07-05/crypto-venture-investors-choi-wang-launch-fund-for-web3
